title: The Amazing Holiday Scavenger Hunt
desc:
POGO Events presents The Amazing Holiday Scavenger Hunt - part hunt, part obstacle course and ALL NEW YORK. A series of clues leads you around the city performing physical and mental challenges along the way. 
 Let's celebrate the Holidays early! 
 Each member of the winning team receives a New York City gift package including tickets to? Quiet Clubbing ,? The Big Quiz Thing ,? Shake Rattle and Roll ?and more. 
 The hunt takes three hours. Please wear comfortable shoes. One member of the team should have a smart phone (either Android or iPhone). 
 The hunt is run through an app called ScanQuest. Please download that before you come to the event. 
 It is a great way to connect with friends or meet new ones.
